text: Saado Abdel Salam Fouflia (; born 23 November 1997) is a Palestinian professional footballer who plays as a defender for Ermis Aradippou. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="3"|Platanias |2016–17 |rowspan="2"|Super League Greece |1||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||1||0 |- |2017–18 |3||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||3||0 |- |2018–19 |Football League |1||0||1Appearances in the Greek Cup||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||2||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !4!!0!!1!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!5!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Palestinian footballers Category:Palestinian expatriate footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Panetolikos F.C. players Category:Platanias F.C. players Category:Expatriate footballers in Greece
